column4: Hi, using Feisty 7.04, my system frequently locks up, becoming responsive roughly for one second every minute. If I use those seconds of responsiveness to check 'top', nothing particularly strange comes up - firefox-bin is top with 25%, but even kill -9 on that doesn't make the system resposive again. Anyone any hints?
What speed computer, how much RAM?
500MB, Latitude D600. Ubuntu is speedy as hell normally, but sometimes it just locks up
